scripts.build: powershell -Command "next build; robocopy .next\static .next\standalone\.next\static /E /LOG:robocopy-static.log /TEE; if ($LASTEXITCODE -gt 7) { exit $LASTEXITCODE }; robocopy public .next\standalone\public /E /LOG:robocopy-public.log /TEE; if ($LASTEXITCODE -gt 7) { exit $LASTEXITCODE }"
